data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Discuss a speech or lecture that you heard.
data.answer: OK, I'm going to talk about a speech I heard on TED that was given by a famous lecturer, and the topic was about global environmental issues. Before I heard this lecture, I used to think that lectures were all about telling jokes to make the audience laugh. But after I watched one of the TED performances on a TV program about one year ago, it really blew my mind. I never thought that a lecture could change boring subjects, such as social and political issues, into a thoughtful and creative show. It was this TED show that completely changed my perspective about lectures. I think this is what made this lecture stand out among all the TV programs. It has the ability to talk about very serious and controversial issues in a way that can connect with normal people. Therefore, I was super impressed by the TED lecture. （150 字）

options.content: What was the topic of the speech?
Were you impressed? Why or why not?
